ValidationRule.description: A timecard cannot be edited after it's synced to NetSuite
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(Phase__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Invoice_Status__c,"Not-Synced")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Invoice_Status__c,"Exclude from Billing")), NOT($Profile.Id="00e50000001BmUZ"), NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This timecard has already been synched to NetSuite. Please contact your system administrator to make any changes.
